message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $140. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can see if I can meet you in the middle. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $135. Is that something you'd be interested in?
Thanks for adjusting, Alice. I'd like to propose $130 as my offer.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $135, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the original price I offered. I'm offering the product to you for $137.50. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. How about $135?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $138. Is that something you'd be interested in?
Considering your last offer, how about $137?
I'm not willing to go any lower than my last offer, Bob. I'm going to stick with $138. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options. Is $138 still not acceptable to you?
